description.author: Galois, Inc.
description.description: Cryptol is a domain-specific language for specifying cryptographic algorithms. A Cryptol implementation of an algorithm resembles its mathematical specification more closely than an implementation in a general purpose language. For more, see <http://www.cryptol.net/>.

package-flags.name: relocatable
package-flags.description: Don't use the Cabal-provided data directory for looking up Cryptol libraries. This is useful when the data directory can't be known ahead of time, like for a relocatable distribution.
